
{{alias}}()
    Returns a regular expression to match a duration string.

    Returns
    -------
    re: RegExp: Regular expression
        Regular expression to match a duration string.

    Examples
    --------
    > var RE = {{alias}}();
    > var parts = RE.exec( '3d2ms' )
    [ '3d2ms', '3d', undefined, undefined, undefined, '2ms', index: 0, input:
    '3d2ms', groups: undefined ]
    > parts = RE.exec( '4h3m20s' )
    [ '4h3m20s', undefined, '4h', '3m', '20s', undefined, index: 0, input:
    '4h3m20s', groups: undefined ]

    See Also
    --------


    See Also
    --------
